Title: Duke Crakmarrow
Legend: Duke Crakmarrow is the liege-lord of the Grymwatch. This cadaverous creature is seen as an exemplar of glorious gallantry by his kin, and a blood-spattered, carriondevouring monstrosity by the foes he meets in battle.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single, Unique. Duke Crakmarrow and The Grymwatch must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Mortevell’s Helcourt

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONDuke Crakmarrow is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with a Halberd.

Rules.Name: Muster The Grymwatch
Rules.Fluff: At the Duke’s beckoning, the Grymwatch are summoned forth.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIESMuster the Grymwatch: In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly GRYMWATCH unit within 3" of this model and roll 6 dice. For each 2+, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.

Rules.Name: Gallant Champion
Rules.Fluff: Duke Crakmarrow has embarked upon a noble quest to slay the great beast that threatens his kingdom.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made by this model that targets a MONSTER.
